text: William Rush (born 6 July 1994) is an English actor and singer-songwriter. He is best known for portraying the role of Josh Stevenson in the BBC school- based drama series Waterloo Road (2009â€“2013). Rush has also made appearances in various British television series, including Grange Hill, Shameless, Drop Dead Gorgeous, Casualty, Coronation Street and Vera. ==Personal life== Rush is the son of Coronation Street actress Debbie Rush. ==Other websites== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Bury Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: William Rush (actor)
